Nightsrtike::

"All MAximnals will pay this..." Tought he decepticon while he leave 
the vehicle and restraining his rage Nightstrike said  to 
Prowl "What's next??? The execution or the torture?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod/Epyon/Prowl/Skyburst::
> 
> Hot Rod made his voice strong and bold, so the Decep wouldn't think 
he
> had any control of the situation.
> "You are our prisoner now. What we decide to do, to you is up to 
us. And
> dont try your comm unit. Epyon's stun energy shorted it out."
> Hot Rod pulls into Maximal City.
> 
> Epyon comes in a few seconds later, and transformes to bot mode, 
sword
> in hand.
> 
> Skyburst sees this and comes over, his photon blasters ready.
> 
> Prowl signals for Alpha and Azure to follow. He walks up to the 
others.
> "Ok, Hot Rod, open up."
> 
> Hot Rod opens his hatch.
> 
> "Get out of the behical, and dont try anything. Look around, and 
you'll
> see why. You'll be scrap in seconds," Prowl orders Nightstrike.
